mapper.select: select * from BT_MENU where MENU_DEL_YN = 'N' order by MENU_SEQ asc
mapper.insert: insert into BT_MENU (MENU_LABEL, MENU_ICON, MENU_SEPARATOR,MENU_SEQ,MENU_PATH) values (#{MENU_LABEL}, #{MENU_ICON}, #{MENU_SEPARATOR},#{MENU_SEQ},#{MENU_PATH})
mapper.update: update BT_MENU set MENU_LABEL = #{MENU_LABEL}, MENU_ICON = #{MENU_ICON}, MENU_SEQ = #{MENU_SEQ}, MENU_SEPARATOR = #{MENU_SEPARATOR} , MENU_PATH = #{MENU_PATH} where MENU_NUM = #{MENU_NUM}
update BT_MENU set MENU_DEL_YN = 'Y' where MENU_NUM = #{MENU_NUM}
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(MENU_SEQ) FROM BT_MENU WHERE MENU_DEL_YN='N'
